    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_73b938543ec59b8de7dfe60de89bad85d48e740e</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sodium carbonate and sulphuric acid reaction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktion des Natriumkarbonats und der 
Schwefelsäure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction de carbonate de sodium et d'acide 
sulfurique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação do carbonato de sodium e do ácido 
sulfúrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione del carbonato di sodio e dell'acido 
solforico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση ανθρακικού άλατος νατρίου και θειικού 
οξέος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción del carbonato de sodio y del ácido 
sulfúrico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Last of three word equations showing an incorrect way to describe the chemical reaction between sodium carbonate and sulphuric acid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium carbonate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium sulphate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sulphuric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">word equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Letzt von drei Wortgleichungen, die eine falsche 
Methode zeigen, die chemische Reaktion zwischen Natriumkarbonat und 
Schwefelsäure zu beschreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dernier de trois équations de mot montrant une 
voie incorrecte de décrire la réaction chimique entre le carbonate 
de sodium et l'acide sulfurique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Último de três equações da palavra que 
mostram uma maneira incorreta descrever a reação química entre o 
carbonato de sodium e o ácido sulfúrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ultimo di tre equazioni di parola che mostrano un
modo errato descrivere la reazione chimica fra il carbonato di sodio e
l'acido solforico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαρκέστε τριών εξισώσεων λέξης που εμφανίζουν 
ανακριβή τρόπο να περιγραφεί η χημική αντίδραση μεταξύ του 
ανθρακικού άλατος νατρίου και του θειικού οξέος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pasado de tres ecuaciones de la palabra que 
muestran una manera incorrecta de describir la reacción química 
entre el carbonato de sodio y el ácido sulfúrico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Salz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Natriumkarbonat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
